sub_title: Product Manager Licensed at Zelus, Authorized  licensee of Nike inc
summary: Passionate, energetic and enthusiastic Product Merchandise Manager with more than 20 years’ experience spent in the sport fashion industry as well as in different global and multicultural environment. I have a boundless energy and results oriented commitment. My technical area of expertise is product creation process, merchandising and business strategic line planning. Besides that that I’ve also gained an extensive knowledge of domestic and international retail landscape, consumer trend, and product line dynamics. Experience in international product development and manufacturing processes. Looking forward to further learn and share my product passion and knowledge

certifications.name: SAP Training- AFS Sales and Distribution model- Specializing in order management

company.name: ZELUS, Authorized Licensee of NIKE, Inc.

profile_positions.company: ZELUS, Authorized Licensee of NIKE, Inc.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager Licensed

profile_positions.description:
•	Define and build merchandising channel specific product assortments and maintain these throughout the Go-To-Market process.
•	Define and deliver sell-in tools (inclusive of catalogs, line list, presentation decks, material data) appropriate to each account/channel.
•	Work in collaboration with x-functional team (sales, planning, marketing, content creation) and different accounts to build a strong relationship, in alignment with seasonal calendar milestones. 
•	To be part of the EMEA Merchandising team as well as an integral teammate of the POD team assuring a close collaboration with different functions within the organization. 
•	Analyze sales trends and competitive landscape to generate recommendations for strategic action to meet account performance objectives and the right customer expectations.
•	Work customer/accounts focused and report about market trends to service the market needs (Right product, Right place, Right time & Right price).
•	Ensure throughout the go to market process a streamlined collaboration of any operational needs between category regional Merchandising and specific accounts. 
•	Support translating accounts/market and regional merchandising strategy into seasonal assortment strategy and execution in market.
profile_positions.title: EMEA Channel Merchandiser Lead for Performance Specialty Accounts and  Team Sports
Merchandising Lead Inter. on field,  Global football, Outdoor and  Team Sports EMEA

profile_positions.description:
•	Drive business growth for Under Armour sponsored football and rugby teams, creating a solid short- and long-term commercial strategy
•	Build regional calendar timeline and create awareness around regional and local key gates. Setting out key milestones in the product calendar from product brief to commercialization
•	Create seasonal product line plan to satisfy teams and market needs as well as pushing for retail/market opportunities
•	Provide seasonal briefs to global partners. Build seasonal assortment plans making sure to offer performance and functional solutions to our Athletes as well as create incremental revenue opportunities
•	Drive market price strategy. Work in conjunction with global partners for profitable and healthy margins
•	Determine sell in strategy, provide clear guidelines and tools to support successful EMEA sell in 
•	Kit Launch process: build robust and solid calendar around retail launch dates. Work in conjunction with Sports Marketing, Brand Marketing and Supply chain to clearly define step by step process from brand activation to product delivery
•	Licensee partnership: play a key role to support team sports growth in our grass roots business. Responsible for new products requests and approvals, aligning prices with local market/strategies and get clear visibility on new teams and events requests
•	Playing a true leadership role creating and supporting strategies and processes improvements
profile_positions.title: Int. on Field Merchandising  Manager Europe , Football & Rugby

profile_positions.description:
Seasonal Planning

- Partner with Account Managers and Retail Buyers to create and maintain Seasonal Account    Assortment Plans that meet UA and Account financial targets and goals.
- Reconcile Seasonal Account Plans to Bookings through Post-Bookings Reviews.
- Identify liabilities and gains to UA and account plan.
- Partner with Merchandise Planning Team on assortment-related questions.
- Partner with Account Manager and Retail Marketing team to influence floor fixture layout and      customize plans to ensure fixture fills and turn.

Financial Planning

- Manage sales forecast to financial targets.
- Create and maintain Yearly Summary Forecast Pivots to review monthly with Account Managers.
- Create and Maintain 12-month Financial Plans; reconcile to seasonal retailer OTB/receipt plans.
- Analyze financial impact to account related to sales/margin/turn.
- Identify markdown/promotion opportunities and develop contingency plans for inventory management.

Account Analysis
- Provide  sell through analisys  on product performance , including: Category/Key Item/Color Performance &Trends; Top/Bottom Styles and Sell-Thru; Door Analysis (productivity, regional trends, volume);  Regular vs. Markdown sales.
- Identify opportunities and liabilities (RTVs, MDs) based on analysis.
profile_positions.title: Sales Planner Europe

profile_positions.description:
•	Directly responsible for the growth and development of a $20 million wholesale apparel business across Swoosh Retail, Lifestyle and Training Apparel
•	Managed the global product line from concept through to commercialization across both men’s and boys lifestyle apparel for global markets - EMEA, Asia, US and Americas
•	Created seasonal marketing line plans and design briefs in line with brand key initiatives, creative direction and global market needs
•	Built seasonal strategic business plans to fully optimize commercial opportunities within existing markets
•	On site product development trips to Asia and Europe with design, sourcing and development teams
•	Created impactful product presentations and acted as lead presenter at all key product meetings
•	Built strong working relationships with design, development, marketing, sales, operations and  country merchandising teams
•	Performed Focus groups and market researches for football category to get a better insight of current business and market needs

profile_positions.title: Associate Apparel Product manager

profile_positions.description:

•	Calendar discipline

•	Work according to the business KPIs
